spec_data.Name: clufter-common
spec_data.Description:
While primarily aimed at (CMAN,rgmanager)->(Corosync/CMAN,Pacemaker) cluster
stacks configuration conversion (as per RHEL trend), the command-filter-format
framework (capable of XSLT) offers also other uses through its plugin library.

This package contains internal, arch-agnostic files for clufter.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 11:13:45 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Common internal data files for clufter
